showerReviews.reviewText: Dropped off my wife at cabin for baby shower. Drove around the park and marveled how beautiful it is. Loved daily exercising here when I lived in PA. People around here are so lucky to have such a gem at their disposal!

We hosted a wedding shower at the cabin for about 60-70 people. It was perfect! Plenty of space and pretty for having a hosted meal. Only note is that it doesn't have AC. We used a bunch of fans and it was stil humid ( understandable in …

I attending a shower that was held in the upstairs community center. The space was a very good size and accommodated everything needed. The parking lot is separate from the building and I wish there was a sign for that because I'm pretty …
Nice improvements to the outdoor rink...a shower and change rooms would be a nice addition however.

showerReviews.reviewText: Such a nice club. It’s more expensive than my old workout place, but they offer so much more! Wonderful classes, beautiful yoga room, very clean shower facilities, smiling front desk greeters…. I definitely recommend!

… children to go to kid zone. We use to spend our weekends at Oxford as a family for four. We would workout and shower while the kids were in kid zone. As a family we would grab lunch every sat. Now we are considering canceling our membership …

… want, but I just attended a FREE health seminar put on by a brilliant doctor where I leaned soooooo much! And the entire place is so clean, even the shower areas where I don’t even need to bring towels or shampoo etc! PRICELESS and AMAZING!

… frustrating to even walk in the door. The hygiene protocols? Barely followed. The shower areas are consistently filthy. It’s clear no one’s paying attention to cleanliness. And speaking of staff, they are some of the most unfriendly …

showerReviews.reviewText: I had my bridal shower here recently and it was the perfect spot. A large room with chairs/tables you can set up how you would like, a kitchen for all prepping needs & you have access to the community center all day. Located right off 376 …

We had our baby shower here recently, and the area is so quaint and peaceful. Our shower was amazing because of how great this space is. It had everything that we needed to make this event run smoothly. 10/10 would recommend.

My bridal shower was hosted here a few weeks ago. The space is great, the kitchen is super helpful. Great to DYI and save some money, and it was awesome to have the space for the whole day. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because …
Very nice place for a shower or private party. It has a full kitchen. It's the old Rosslyn Farms school. Right off of 376 and very easy to get to.

showerReviews.reviewText: … beach towel to chill on the grass by the pool. Haven't seen any water fountains, but there is water for purchase. Showers are clean, shower water is cool and nobody seems to use either. Pool closes in case of thunder and sprinkles, so, may …

… 50m, is great for swimming laps, plenty of lap lanes, although no backstroke flags. The locker rooms are AWFUL, like a complete joke.  No private showers, no hooks, no benches, no electricity to blow dry your hair, nothing.  Shower at home.
